dcterms:description: The M4 Competition dataset consists of 100,000 time series used for forecasting competitions, providing a benchmark for evaluating forecasting methods.

dcterms:description: The M3 Competition dataset includes various time series used to evaluate forecasting methods, contributing to the understanding of forecasting accuracy.

dcterms:description: The M1 Competition dataset is a set of univariate time series used to evaluate forecasting methods and their combinations.
